tool.name: DNA-Bot
tool.description: DNA assembly using BASIC on OpenTrons
tool.command: python -m dnabot.dnabot_app #if $adv.default_settings_file --default_settings_file '$adv.default_settings_file' #end if nogui --construct_path '$construct_file' #set files = '" "'.join([str($file) for $file in $plate_files]) --source_paths "${files}" --etoh_well '$adv.etoh_well' --soc_column '$adv.soc_column' --output_dir 'output' && tar -cvf '$dnabot_scripts' 'output'

param.name: construct_file
param.label: Source Construct
param.help: File listing constructs to be implemented.

param.name: plate_files
param.label: Plate files
param.help: File(s) listing parts to be used in constructs.

param.name: default_settings_file
param.label: Yaml file providing labware IDs and parameter to be used

param.name: etoh_well
param.label: Well coordinate for Ethanol
param.help: Coordinates of the well plate providing ethanol for the purification step.

param.name: soc_column
param.label: Column coordinate for SOC
param.help: Coordinate of the column plate providing SOC media for the transformation step.

tool.help:
DNA-Bot ============
DNA assembly using BASIC on OpenTrons
Input -----
* **construct_file**: (string) CSV file listing constructs to be implemented. * **plate_files**: (string) File(s) listing parts to be used in constructs. * **etoh_well**: (string) Coordinates of the well plate providing ethanol for the purification step. Default: A11 * **soc_column**: (integer) Coordinate of the column plate providing SOC media for the transformation step. Default: 1. * **default_settings_file**: (string) file providing labware IDs and parameter to be used. Default: dnabot/default_settings.yaml.
Ouput -----
* **dnabot_scripts**: (string) DNA-Bot scripts in TAR format which implement the 4 assembly steps and metainformation to keep track of parameters.

3.1.0
